ai-tika-vin09t19:112_0: Thus there are doubts and uncertainty that
ai-tika-vin09t19:113_0: rice porridge on the Monastic Law
ai-tika-vin09t19:114_0: The successive series of other mendicants is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t19:115_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
